parameters.name: InstanceIdList
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The field that is used to sort the Anti-DDoS Origin instances. Set the value to **expireTime**, which indicates that the instances are sorted based on the expiration time.

You can set the **Orderdire** parameter to specify the sorting method.

parameters.name: InstanceTypeList
parameters.description: The total number of Anti-DDoS Origin instances.

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description:
The sorting method. Valid values:

*   **desc**: the descending order. This is the default value.
*   **asc**: the ascending order.

parameters.name: IpVersion
parameters.description: The IP address of the object that is protected by the Anti-DDoS Origin instance to query.

parameters.name: Orderby
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the Anti-DDoS Origin instance to query resides.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~118703~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Orderdire
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description:
The protocol type of the IP address asset that is protected by the Anti-DDoS Origin instance to query. Valid values:

*   **Ipv4**: IPv4
*   **Ipv6**: IPv6

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The mitigation plan of the Anti-DDoS Origin instance to query. Valid values:

*   **0**: the Professional mitigation plan
*   **1**: the Enterprise mitigation plan

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The remarks of the Anti-DDoS Origin instance to query. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The key of the tag that is added to the Anti-DDoS Origin instance.
